title: Distribution of the workforce across economic sectors in Italy 2019
summary: You are viewing a chart of multi-line type with 3 lines denoting Agriculture, Industry, and Services. The y axis indicates the Percentage of the workforce and the x axis indicates Year.
Overall Services is gradually increasing, Industry is gradually decreasing, Agriculture is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Percentage of the workforce in descending order is: 1. Services, 2. Industry, and lastly, 3. Agriculture.
Throughout the period, Services generally had the highest Percentage of the workforce relative to others with an average of 69.2, and it reached its maximum at 2019 with a value of 70.66.
After Services, Industry overall has the second highest values , with a mean value of 27.0, peaking at 2009.
Agriculture mostly had the least Percentage of the workforce with a mean value of 3.72, which peaked at 2016 with a value of 3.88.
